text.p: Cleanup continues along the Red River in the upper Plains of the USA, and cleanup will begin in the coming days in southern Manitoba, near Winnepeg, as waters continue to recede. Rainfall of 0.10-0.60 inch the next 36 hours, and another similar event over the weekend may result in mostly minor flooding aggrivations.

Tropical Storm Kelley, with 40 mph winds, is near 11.6n/166.7e, moving north at 4 mph. Kelly will turn more westerly over the next 24 hours while intensifying. This system will become more a threat to shipping in Micronesia this period as top winds approach 70 mph by 48 hours.
